title: Cookie Recipes: A Collection of Only the Best Mouthwatering Cookies Around Sure To Amaze and Have Your Friends and Family Saying MMMM
description: A Collection of the Best, Mouthwatering Cookie Recipes to Amaze Family and Friends Is there anything better than a warm, gooey cookie pulled straight from the oven? These are cookie recipes like our grandmothers made…lots of delicious ingredients, blended easily together and cooked to perfection. As the aroma fills your home, a rush of memories will fill your mind and tempt your tongue. These recipes are easy to follow and will not have you peeking into the oven, as you await the scrumptious result…they are guaranteed to deliver in ease and flavor. An Incredible Assortment of Unique Recipes Here’s a small sample of what’s included in this remarkable Peppermint Chocolate Patties Whipped Cookies Chocolate Truffle Cookies Fruitcake Cookies Frosted Sugar Cookie Bars Chocolate Pumpkin Macaroons Cashew Butter Spritz Cookies Pecan Pie Cookies with Dates Coconut Cookie Delights Vanilla Macaroon Cookies Tiramisu Cookie Sandwich Soon you’ll learn that any number of tasty combinations are possible. Once you’ve mastered the recipes contained in this easy-to-follow cookbook, you’ll astound your family and friends with your own concoctions. There is literally no way to go wrong with this type of baking. Sweet, Delicious, and Ready in Minutes There truly are few things in life that are as easily done as first thought. That should not be the case when baking cookies. Inside this unusually simple guide, you’ll learn how to make decadent chocolate pumpkin cookies, frosted sugar cookies bursting with yummy goodness, fruit flavored delights, and much, much more… Adopt the idea of ‘I can do it’ and buy this cookbook today! You'll have absolutely no regrets, but will be thrilled with the comments these recipes will elicit from your loved ones. When you purchase today, you will also get access to a special free gift from The Essential Kitchen Series ($97 Value).
author: Sarah Sophia
